==Trivia==

* {{W|Frédéric Joliot-Curie}} was a French physicist and husband of {{W|Irène Joliot-Curie}}, with whom he was jointly awarded the {{W|Nobel Prize in Chemistry}} in 1935 for their discovery of {{W|Induced radioactivity|induced radioactivity}}.
